item.title: The Penguin Avoids The Biggest Justice League & Avengers Problem With Robert Pattinson's Batman
item.description: The Penguin's plot is so perfectly self-contained and focused that it avoids a common superhero problem seen in franchises like the MCU and the DCEU.

item.title: What An MCU Scarlet Witch Solo Movie Would Be About Addressed By WandaVision And Agatha All Along Creator
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: WandaVision and Agatha All Along showrunner shares what she would tackle with a Scarlet Witch movie for Elizabeth Olsen's MCU character.

item.title: The Reason Prey 2 Hasn't Happened Yet Makes Elle Fanningâ€™s Upcoming Predator Movie Even More Exciting
item.description: Predator: Badlands will be the next entry in the long-running sci-fi saga, and the reason it was chosen over Prey 2 makes it very exciting indeed.
